name: A Child's Dream of a Potato
description:
A personified vegetable hangs over a submerged goat and the remnants of a distorted ferris wheel. The stuff dreams are made of.

The original has been exhibited in several galleries including Gallery 21, Newark, NJ and Pratt Institute, Brooklyn, NY

Details: 
8"x10" Reproduction
Archival Semi-Gloss paper or you may request Edition Etching Rag 
Archival (well 100+ years) HP Vivera inks 
Professionally Printed
Signed by artist

Ships in a cello sleeve, supported by layers of archival mat board
USPS First Class
Protective mailer to insure safe transit from my house to yours. 

Prefer another size or selection of paper? Send a message my way; we print up to 24"x36". 

Thanks for looking!

name: House of the Good Shepherd, for Billie Holiday
description:
Brand new and completely official. 
Inspired by my memory of the song "Strange Fruit"

Countless faces hidden in the rocks.
Faces and even a pale jellyfish in the sky!

Contact me for Framing with UV Glass: the best of rates from the shop I work at.

I love the paper so much: 
Ruscombe Paper Mill / Papier Fait Main
Classic Handmade Watercolor Paper
15" x 11" / 28 x 37 cms

All Archival Materials
Signed by Artist
Labeled on back

Ships Priority USPS with Insurance and Tracking
Protected in transit with acid-free paper

name: Bacteria A and B
description:
Some sweet and abstracted bacteria for your room or office. With their little teeth and many eyes, they are sure to watch over you in the best of ways. 

The Specs:

name: Stack of Shacks
description:
My original drawing has been sold but the Stack of Shacks is now available as a glossy black and white print. I always loved rolling past shanty towns in Mexico, Venezuela, Nicaragua...They fascinate me and I enjoyed staying with families in many of them.

The Specs: 

Artwork will not be printed dead center! Comfortably on the right.
Measures 8"x10" 
Semi Gloss or you may specify etching rag matte paper 
Archival (well 100+ years) HP Vivera inks 
Professionally Printed
Signed by artist 

Ships First Class in an archival cello sleeve and a sturdy mailer. 

**Contact me for additional sizes and pricing for archival reproductions up to 20x30
